original_text: And he rolled up the scroll and gave it back to the attendant and sat down. And the eyes of all in the synagogue were fixed on him.
korean_text: 책을 덮어 그 맡은 자에게 주시고 앉으시니 회당에 있는 자들이 다 주목하여 보더라

sentences.original_text: And he rolled up the scroll
and gave it back to the attendant
And the eyes of all in the synagogue
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 회당에 있는 모든 사람의 눈이
